appDescription.message: A secure password manager with Touch ID integration and advanced security features

unlock.description: Button text to unlock the vault

unlockWithTouchID.description: Button text to unlock with Touch ID

unlockWithPassword.description: Button text to unlock with password

addPassword.description: Button text to add a new password

generatePassword.description: Button text to generate a password

currentSite.description: Button text for current site passwords

vaultLocked.description: Status text when vault is locked

vaultUnlocked.description: Status text when vault is unlocked

noPasswordsFound.description: Text shown when no passwords match search

connectionErrorMessage.message: Unable to connect to TwoPassword application. Please make sure the native app is installed and running.
